description:
This version has reached End-of-Life (EOL) status and will no longer receive updates.

Known Incompatible Addons: Official Cats Blender Plugin and MMD Tools may cause conflicts as this version includes its own MMD Tools implementation.

For Blender 4.x versions, we recommend using the unofficial Cats add-on for Blender 4.1, which is still actively maintained.

The official Cats add-on is not recommended as it hasn't been updated to support Blender 4.0 API changes.

Due to EOL status, no support will be provided. Please do not ask for help in either Discord server.
